body_html:
@F3PiX 🤔 You might be right about the better documentation. But this is certainly to no small amount thanks to:

Q: How do I upcase a String in JS?
A: Here, take my 400KB jQuery plugin that does this for you! [Accepted answer]
– Virtually every Stackoverflow about JavaScript

😉

What's your take on CoffeeScript?
